meanings.definition: A class of iron-sulfur proteins involved in electron transfer in various biological processes.
meanings.sent1: The ferredoxins played a crucial role in transferring electrons during photosynthesis.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ferredoxins to understand how electrons move in living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The ferredoxins at the electron party were the best dancers, always transferring energy with style.
meanings.sent4: In the cellular dance of life, ferredoxins are the graceful partners passing electrons seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: Imagine ferredoxins as tiny messengers shuttling electrons like busy bees in a garden of cells.
